script_functionality.purpose: Runs a benchmark for a block N-body simulation using OpenMP parallelization.

parameters.ITERATIONS: Number of advancements in the benchmark
parameters.RUNS: How often to run the benchmark

script_functionality.output: Results are stored in a file named nbody_block_${n}_${iter}_omp_C in the specified output directory, containing the number of processors (p), the mean execution time, and the standard deviation of the execution times.
